name: baked-recipe-admin
description: Baked is an opinionated framework for .NET in backend and Nuxt in frontend. This is a recipe package that brings together all the components one needs for an Admin UI.
author: mouseless

scripts.setup: npm run module:build:stub && npm run module:prepare && nuxi prepare playground && npm run lint
scripts.dev:development: npm run setup && nuxi dev playground --dotenv .env.development --host
scripts.dev:production: npm run setup && nuxi dev playground --dotenv .env.production --host
scripts.build:development: npm run setup && nuxi generate playground --dotenv .env.development
scripts.build:production: npm run setup && nuxi generate playground --dotenv .env.production
scripts.local:development: npm run build:development && npx http-server playground/.output/public -p 3000
scripts.local:production: npm run build:production && npx http-server playground/.output/public -p 3000
